body:
three changes required:

1. please use the determinism field as natalia suggested in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/2893#issuecomment-333164213 instead of using DEFAULT_ALGO
2. Introduce a `bool forward` as a second argument to https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/autograd/functions/convolution.cpp#L83
3. if is_dilated and backward mode and deterministic, then return use_cudnn to false.
